ORDER BY DEBATE_END_DATE DESC )

SELECT COUNT(DC.NOTICE_ID) FROM TBL_DEBATE_BOARD DB JOIN TBL_DEBATE_COMMENT DC ON DB.NOTICE_ID = DC.NOTICE_ID WHERE Db.DEBATE_ID = #{debateId}

SELECT COUNT(DEBATE_ID) FROM (SELECT D.DEBATE_ID, TB.TITLE AS BOOK_NAME, MT.MEETING_TYPE, DT.DEBATE_TYPE FROM TBL_DEBATE D JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK B ON D.DEBATE_ID = B.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_TYPE DT ON D.DEBATE_TYPE_ID = DT.DEBATE_TYPE_ID JOIN TBL_MEETING_TYPE MT ON D.MEETING_ID = MT.MEETING_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK TB ON B.ISBN13 = TB.ISBN13 WHERE TO_CHAR(D.GROUP_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
